name: SPGP Early Access Demo/ Public Alpha Test
name_original: SPGP Early Access Demo/ Public Alpha Test
description: SPGP- Launching Jan/Feb 2023, join the fun and get your say in how you want this to play! Any feedback on this early build, please follow me @rozzbozzy (twitter) and leave your comments- all welcome. Note game pad HIGHLY recommended. If your experiencing performance issues, please let me know as this will help me tweak lower end GFX settings prior to launch :)
